data.name: UpgradeInfoBoxCaption
data.comment: Caption of the Upgrade Info Messagebox

data.name: UpgradeFeedlistInfoText
data.value:
Текущата версия на {0} подържа нови възможности. requires a change of your feedlist file format. To keep your older versions running, the application will try to create a new feedlist file from your current list.
The old file will be left untouched.
Do you want to continue?
data.comment: Info text used to inform a user about a feedlist file format change.

data.name: InvalidFeedFileInfoBoxCaption
data.comment: Caption of the infobox displaying an error message about an invalid feedlist file

data.name: ExceptionIBlogExtensionFunctionCall

data.name: ExceptionInvalidFtpUrlSchemeForRemoteStorageLocation
data.value: FTP Remote locations needs to use the 'ftp:' url scheme.

data.name: LabelTextRemoteStorageLocation_WebDAV_hint
data.value: You can store your application state as rssbandit-state.zip within a WebDAV folder. The storage service URL should point to a WebDAV folder, e. g. 'http://mywebdav.com/personal/' and you should be able to save and read files there.

data.name: LabelTextRemoteStorageLocation_dasBlog_hint
data.value: You can store your subscribed feeds as blogroll.opml if you are a user of dasBlog (http://www.dasblog.net). The storage service URL should be http://yourblog.com/dasblog/ConfigEditingService.asmx and you should enable the Configuration Editing service in dasBlog.

data.name: LabelTextRemoteStorageLocation_fileShare_hint
data.value: You can store your application state as rssbandit-state.zip on a local or network file share. Provide the directory path such as '\\yournetworkshare\feedlist\' or 'H:\'.

data.name: LabelTextRemoteStorageLocation_ftp_hint
data.value: You can store your application state as rssbandit-state.zip using an FTP server. Provide the name of the FTP server and path such as 'ftp://yourserver.com:7788/feedlistfolder/'.

data.name: RemoteStorageFeature_Info
data.value: You must configure Remote Storage through the Options dialog before you can use this command.

data.name: RssSearchTypeXPathHintCaption
data.value: Find all posts who's RSS 2.0 representation matches the specified XPath.
data.comment: displayed as a label text on the collapsible panel "Search Type"

data.name: CertificateIssueOnFeedCaption
data.value: Information you exchange with feed '{0}' cannot be viewed or changed by other users. However, there is a problem with the feed's security certificate.

data.name: CertificateIssueOnSiteCaption
data.value: Information you exchange with the site '{0}' cannot be viewed or changed by other users. However, there is a problem with the site's security certificate.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertUNTRUSTEDCA
data.value: The certificate has a untrusted Certification Authory (CA).

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertUNTRUSTEDROOT
data.value: The certificate has a untrusted CA (Certification Authory) root.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertUNTRUSTEDTESTROOT
data.value: The certificate has a untrusted test CA (Certification Authory) root.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertPURPOSE
data.value: The purpose of the certificate does not match the required task.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertCHAINING
data.value: The certificate is already a member of the trust chain.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertISSUERCHAINING
data.value: The certificate issuer is already a member of the trust chain.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertPATHLENCONST
data.value: The certificate caused an error: path length const.
data.comment: Certificate issue dialog detail text (sorry, dunno what that mean...)

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertREVOCATION_FAILURE
data.value: The revocation of the certificate failed.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertROLE
data.value: The role of the certificate is wrong.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertVALIDITYPERIODNESTING
data.value: The validity period of the certificate is nesting.

data.name: CertificateIssue_CertWRONG_USAGE
data.value: The certificate cannot be used for the required task.
